Eco-Dome Al’dani Guide

11.2 - Ghosts of K'aresh

Last Updated:August 5, 2025|Changelog

Welcome to the Eco-Dome Al'dani Mythic+ guide for the World of Warcraft patch 11.2! This guide covers everything you need to know about your upcoming dungeon runs!

Route

Patch 11.2 - Ghosts of K'aresh
Eco-Dome Al'dani

It is recommended to use the Mythic Dungeon Tools addon to look at your route and mob count before the Mythic+ dungeon starts. Below you can see an example of a Weekly Route meant for +10 keys or lower.

Simply import the route into the Mythic Dungeon Tool addon and take a look at it with your group.

Weekly Route

Utility Needs

Patch 11.2 - Ghosts of K'aresh
Eco-Dome Al'dani
Enrage
Bleed
Magic Dispel
Magic Purge
  • ‍Hungering Rage
    • An Enrage effect that increases the attack speed of Ravaging Scavenger.
  • Common utility examples:
    • ‍Hunter
      • ‍Tranquilizing Shot
    • ‍Rogue
      • ‍Shiv
    • ‍Druid
      • ‍Soothe
    • ‍Evoker
      • ‍Oppressing Roar         with
        ‍Overawe
    • ‍Monk
      • ‍Paralysis         with
        ‍Pressure Points
  • ‍Rift Claws
    • A Bleed effect on the tank during the Taah'bat and A'wazj boss encounter, inflicting arcane damage on the application and physical damage every second for 8 seconds.
  • Common utility examples:
    • ‍Evoker
      • ‍Cauterizing Flame
    • ‍Paladin
      • ‍Blessing of Protection
  • ‍Arcing Energy
    • A Magic debuff inflicting arcane damage over time.
      • Interruptible.
  • Common utility examples:
    • ‍Priest
      • ‍Mass Dispel
    • ‍Warlock
      • ‍Singe Magic
  • ‍Alacrity
    • A Magic buff that increases the attack and movement speed of Wastelander Phaseblade.
  • ‍Embrace of K'aresh
    • A Magic buff that absorbs damage taken.
      • Interruptible.
  • Common utility examples:
    • ‍Warlock
      • ‍Devour Magic
    • ‍Hunter
      • ‍Tranquilizing Shot
    • ‍Priest
      • ‍Dispel Magic         and
        ‍Mass Dispel
    • ‍Shaman
      • ‍Purge
    • ‍Mage
      • ‍Spellsteal
    • ‍Demon Hunter
      • ‍Consume Magic

Azhiccar Trash Area

Patch 11.2 - Ghosts of K'aresh
Eco-Dome Al'dani
Ravaging Scavenger
Ravenous Destroyer
Voracious Gorger
Invading Mite
Overgorged Mite
  • Required Enrage Dispel:
    • ‍Hungering Rage
      • Upon dropping below 50% health, the caster gains an Enrage, increasing their attack speed by 50%.
  • ‍Consuming Strikes
    • Consumes a portion of the target's essence, causing melee attacks to heal the caster for 25% of the damage inflicted.
  • ‍Volatile Ejection
    • Unleashes energy towards marked targets, inflicting shadow damage to players in that direction.
  • ‍Gluttonous Miasma
    • Applies a debuff to a random target, inflicting shadow damage to players within 5 yards of the target and healing Ravenous Destroyer for 100% of the damage inflicted.
  • ‍Gorging Smash
    • Inflicts physical damage to players within 60 yards and slamming the ground, launching energy at players, inflicting shadow damage to players withing 5 yards of the impact.
  • ‍Consuming Strikes
    • Consumes a portion of the target's essence, causing melee attacks to heal the caster for 25% of the damage inflicted.
  • ‍Engorge
    • Leaps towards a player, leaching health from them.
  • Required Kick:
    • ‍Gorge
      • Casts at a random player, leeching health and granting the caster an application of
        ‍Overgorged        .
  • ‍Overgorged
    • Bursts upon death, inflicting shadow damage to all players for 5 seconds.
  • ‍Engorge
    • Leaps towards a player, leaching health from them.

Azhiccar

Patch 11.2 - Ghosts of K'aresh
Eco-Dome Al'dani
Overview
‍Devour
‍Invading Shriek
‍Toxic Regurgitation
  • Try to be closely stacked to each other to have an easier time dealing with the adds but be ready to run out with a
    ‍Toxic Regurgitation     debuff.
    • Press a defensive cooldown whenever you are targeted by
      ‍Toxic Regurgitation      .
  • During the
    ‍Devour     don't be in the boss, otherwise you die, and immediately swap to the adds to not let them get consumed by Azhiccar.
  • As a tank, always be in melee of the boss, aside from the
    ‍Devour     phase, otherwise Azhiccar will wipe out the group with a
    ‍Thrash     ability.
  • Upon reaching 100 energy, Azhiccar inhales and attempts to consume all players and creatures in the arena for 18 seconds, inflicting shadow damage to all players every second.
    • Each time Azhiccar successfully consumes a living creature or player, it
      ‍Feasts      , inflicting shadow damage and stunning it. On top of it, Azhiccar restores 5% of its maximum health and gains 15% increased damage done for 1.5 minutes. This effect stacks.
  • Azhiccar screeches, calling forth Devourer Mites to join the battle and inflicting physical damage to all players.
    • Devourer Mites attack random targets, while leaping at them, leeching and gaining a stacking damage increase.
  • Azhiccar spews digestive acid at targeted players, inflicting shadow damage every second for 6 seconds to enemies within 10 yards of impact and leaving a pool of
    ‍Digestive Spittle     at their location.
    • Players standing in
      ‍Digestive Spittle       take shadow damage every 1.5 seconds and have their movement speed reduced by 50%.

Taah'bat and A'wazj Trash Area

Patch 11.2 - Ghosts of K'aresh
Eco-Dome Al'dani
Wastelander Phaseblade
Overcharged Sentinel
Wastelander Farstalker
Tamed Ruinstalker
Wastelander Ritualist
Voracious Gorger
Ravaging Scavenger
  • Required Purge:
    • ‍Alacrity
      • Increases the caster's attack speed by 30% and movement speed by 30% for 10 seconds.
  • ‍Phase Step
    • The caster steps through the shadows towards their target.
  • ‍Protected Core
    • An arcane shield protects the caster's energy core, absorbing damage. Upon removal, gains
      ‍Unstable Core      .
  • ‍Unstable Core
    • Releases a burst of arcane energy, inflicting arcane damage to a random player and leaving an Unstable Rift at their location.
  • ‍Arcane Slash
    • Cone frontal in the direction of the current target, inflicting arcane damage to players struck, causing them to suffer additional arcane damage for 9 seconds. This effect stacks.
  • Required Kick:
    • ‍Arcing Zap
      • Blasts the target with arcane energy that arcs up to 3 players, inflicting arcane damage.
  • ‍Farstalker's Leap
    • Leaps to a random player's location, inflicting arcane damage to players within 4 yards of the impact.
  • ‍Warp
    • Warps to a location, inflicting arcane damage to players within the area of effect.
  • Required Kick:
    • ‍Arcing Energy
      • Applies a Magic debuff to a random player, inflicting arcane damage to players within 5 yards for 9 seconds.
    • ‍Arcane Bolt
      • Bolt of arcane energy, inflicting arcane damage to the target.
  • ‍Gorging Smash
    • Inflicts physical damage to players within 60 yards and slamming the ground, launching energy at players, inflicting shadow damage to players withing 5 yards of the impact.
  • ‍Consuming Strikes
    • Consumes a portion of the target's essence, causing melee attacks to heal the caster for 25% of the damage inflicted.
  • Required Enrage Dispel:
    • ‍Hungering Rage
      • Upon dropping below 50% health, the caster gains an Enrage, increasing their attack speed by 50%.
  • ‍Consuming Strikes
    • Consumes a portion of the target's essence, causing melee attacks to heal the caster for 25% of the damage inflicted.

Taah'bat and A'wazj

Patch 11.2 - Ghosts of K'aresh
Eco-Dome Al'dani
Overview
‍Arcane Blitz
‍Binding Javelin
‍Warp Strike
‍Rift Claws
  • Taah'bat and A'wazj share their health due to
    ‍Beastmaster's Bond     which means that you should do the maximum amount of cleave damage after the
    ‍Arcane Blitz     phase when both bosses are attackable.
  • Try to stack with
    ‍Binding Javelins     as much as you can without overlapping onto each other to have an easier time killing them.
    • Press a defensive cooldown whenever you are targeted by it.
  • During the ‍
    ‍Arcane Blitz     phase, aim the
    ‍Warp Strike     through the boss but don't get hit yourself with other people's lines.
  • Upon reaching 100 energy, A'wazj vanishes and unleashes
    ‍Warp Strike     at players while Taah'bat gains
    ‍Incorporeal     and goes into
    ‍Arcane Overload    .
    • During this phase, due to
      ‍Incorporeal      , Taah'bat takes reduced damage by 99% until shattered out of the ether. Upon being struck with
      ‍Warp Strike      , Taah'bat loses an application of
      ‍Incorporeal      . Upon losing all applications of
      ‍Incorporeal      , both A'wazj and Taah'bat are getting knocked out of the ether and are stunned for 15 seconds.
  • Taah'bat launches arcane javelins at targeted players, inflicting arcane damage to players within 8 yards of the targets and tethering all players struck.
    • Each tether inflicts arcane damage every second and reduces their movement speed by 50%, increasing in intensity every 5 seconds until the javelin is destroyed. This effect stacks.
  • A'wazj warps through the target, inflicting arcane damage to players in its path and causing them to suffer arcane damage every second for 5 seconds. This effect stacks.
  • A'wazj slashes their current target with its arcane-charged claws, inflicting arcane damage and causing them to bleed.

Soul-Scribe Trash Area

Patch 11.2 - Ghosts of K'aresh
Eco-Dome Al'dani
Wastelander Pactspeaker
K'aresh Elemental
  • Required Kick:
    • ‍Arcane Bolt
      • Bolt of arcane energy, inflicting arcane damage to the target.
  • ‍Erratic Ritual
    • Caster performs a ritual, inflicting arcane damage to all players for 6 seconds.
  • ‍Spirit Protection
    • Reduces damage taken by 99% for 9 seconds. During that time, every 3 seconds caster gains a stacking shield absorbing damage equal to 10% of their own maximum health.
  • Required Kick:
    • ‍Embrace of K'aresh
      • Surrounds the target with a shield, absorbing damage taken for 20 seconds.
        • A Magic buff that can be purged.

Soul-Scribe

Patch 11.2 - Ghosts of K'aresh
Eco-Dome Al'dani
Overview
‍Whispers of Fate
‍Eternal Weave
‍Dread of the Unknown
‍Ceremonial Dagger
  • The whole concept of the fight will revolve around you collecting your soul before it gets hit by any of the boss's abilities and avoiding getting hit by them yourself.
  • In total boss only has 3 abilities:
    ‍Lines    ,
    ‍Circles     and
    ‍Cones    .
    ‍Lines     and
    ‍Circles     are easy to deal with, all you do is collect your soul quickly when it's out and avoid getting hit yourself. But
    ‍Cones     may seem confusing at first. The trick is to not panic and remember that they happen very slowly, so the strat is going to be to always prioritize going for the souls that are in the cone currently, pick them up quickly and then look for the other ones.
    • Always press a defensive cooldown if you fail to collect your soul as you will be afflicted with a
      ‍Wounded Fate       debuff that reduces your haste and inflicts arcane damage every 2 seconds over its duration.
  • Throughout the whole fight, you take ticking arcane damage from
    ‍Echoes of Fate    .
  • Soul-Scribe shatters the fate of every player, summoning echoes of their
    ‍Fate     and causing them to suffer from arcane damage.
    • Converged with
      ‍Fate      , increasing damage and healing done by 10% for 10 seconds. This effect stacks.
  • Upon reaching 100 energy Soul-Scribe enters a ritual for 24 seconds, unleashing a series of cones that inflict arcane damage to players caught within.
    • Fates struck afflict their bound player with
      ‍Wounded Fate      .
  • ‍Splinters of Fate
    • Soul-Scribe splinters the soul of every player, summoning multiple echoes of their Fate and causing them to suffer arcane damage.
  • Soul-Scribe imbues marked players with dread. Upon expiration, the player erupts inflicting arcane damage to players within 9 yards of the eruption.
    • Fates struck afflict their bound player with
      ‍Wounded Fate      .
  • While being affected by a
    ‍Wounded Fate    , players suffer arcane damage every 2 seconds and have their haste reduced by 30% for 8 seconds.
  • Soul-Scribe flings daggers in the direction of Fates and Fatebound players, inflicting arcane damage to players struck and inflicting an additional arcane damage every 1.5 seconds for 6 seconds.
    • Fates struck afflict their bound player with
      ‍Wounded Fate      .

Lootpool

Patch 11.2 - Ghosts of K'aresh
Eco-Dome Al'dani
Trinkets/Jewelry
Weapons
Armor
